MoveSearcher - Class in mychessmate
 
MoveSearcher(MyChessmate) - Constructor for class mychessmate.MoveSearcher
This class represents a move searcher for a chess game, using the alpha-beta pruning algorithm to evaluate the possible moves.

The Position class represents the state of the chess board and holds information about the game including the board, last move made, and pieces owned by the player and the computer.
